Description.Text: The 3-star El Magistral de Aviles hotel offers modern comfort and convenience in one of Spainâs most genteel cities. Located in the heart of Aviles, the hotel is within walking distance of its many attractions, an experience that is made all the more enjoyable by a largely pedestrianised inner city. Linked by squares and winding streets, the Old Town and its richly-coloured buildings are a must. Here can be found the Plaza de Espana and the 17th century Palacio del Marques de Camposagrado, as well as the Palacio de Ferrara which leads to a beautiful park of the same name. For beach-lovers, the coast is only about 5km away. The hotel occupies a handsome terrace, the detailed facade of which has been carefully restored. The interior is warm and welcoming, reflecting the colourful aspect of Avilesâ Old Town, while also ushering in a fresh, contemporary style. Along with friendly and efficient service, the hotel provides modern touches such as free hotel-wide wireless internet access. The ON restaurant and bar is a fun and lively venue, offering diners an excellent selection of Asturian dishes, using only the highest quality ingredients. The Standard guestrooms are simply and tastefully designed, employing soft pastel colours to create a relaxing atmosphere. Notable amenities include a mini bar, both smoking and non-smoking rooms and a private bathroom with bathtub or shower. Room service is available.
